forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 57F. Winds ESE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. E winds shifting to N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 48F. E winds shifting to N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early with mainly sunny skies later in the day as drier air moves in on gusty breezes. High 12C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning, then partly cloudy and windy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Higher wind gusts possible.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. Becoming windy during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. Becoming windy during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low around 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
